SELECT t.ticket_id ticketId, t.ticket_type ticketType, ( CASE WHEN t.ticket_type = '1' THEN '告警工单' WHEN t.ticket_type = '2' THEN '巡检工单' WHEN t.ticket_type = '3' THEN '维保工单' ELSE '' END ) ticketTypeName, t.title title, t.comments comments, t.ticket_level ticketLevel, t.address address, t.event_time eventTime, t.device_code deviceCode, t.pump_id pumpId, t.area_id areaId, t.channel channel, t.report_name reportName, t.report_phone reportPhone, t.start_time startTime, t.end_time endTime, t.create_Date createDate, t.update_Date updateDate, t.create_by createByStr, t.update_by updateByStr, t.ticket_reason ticketReason, t.ticket_description ticketDescription, t.`status` AS status, ( CASE
WHEN t.`status` = '1' THEN '新建' WHEN t.`status` = '2' THEN '待接单' WHEN t.`status` = '3' THEN '处理中' WHEN t.`status` = '4' THEN '审核中' WHEN t.`status` = '5' THEN '完成' ELSE '' END ) currentStatusName, t.biz_id bizId, de.`NAME` deviceName, p.`NAME` pumpName FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN device de ON de.ID = t.device_code LEFT JOIN pump_house p ON p.id = de.ID_PUMP_HOUSE
WHERE t.valid_flag = '1'
and t.ticket_Id=#{ticketId}

SELECT t.ticket_id ticketId, g.approve_opinion approveOpinion, g.approve_operation approveOperation, u.`name` ticketLogName, g.CREATE_Date createDate, t.`status` AS status, ( CASE
WHEN t.`status` = '1' THEN '新建' WHEN t.`status` = '2' THEN '待接单' WHEN t.`status` = '3' THEN '处理中' WHEN t.`status` = '4' THEN '审核中' WHEN t.`status` = '5' THEN '完成' ELSE '' END ) currentStatusName FROM ticket_log g LEft JOIN ticket t ON t.ticket_id= g.ticket_id LEFT JOIN device de ON de.ID = t.device_code LEFT JOIN pump_house p ON p.id = de.ID_PUMP_HOUSE LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=g.create_by WHERE t.valid_flag = '1'
and t.ticket_Id=#{ticketId}
ORDER BY g.CREATE_Date asc
